abstract: The Berkshire Hathaway chairman gives his ukulele a workout in a duet with Jon Bon Jovi, just six months after a breakout performance celebrating the Chinese new year.
snippet: The Berkshire Hathaway chairman gives his ukulele a workout in a duet with Jon Bon Jovi, just six months after a breakout performance celebrating the Chinese new year.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett appears to be building a side career as a musician.

headline.main: Buffett Joins Bon Jovi in a Song for Charity
